title: Polish tech helps visually impaired "see" paintings through sound
text:
Polish tech helps visually impaired "see" paintings through sound 5:01pm BST - 01:20
Scientists from Lodz University of Technology in Poland develop software which allows blind and visually impaired people to ''see'' digital paintings through sound. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Scientists from Lodz University of Technology in Poland develop software which allows blind and visually impaired people to "see" digital paintings through sound. Matthew Stock reports.
